mdRecord.dcterms:description: Bed with bed hanging made by May Morris with Jane Morris
Kelmscott Manor was the country home of the writer, designer and socialist William Morris from 1871 until his death in 1896. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kelmscott_Manor [work]
